com.birbit.android.jobqueue

Class Constraint

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.birbit.android.jobqueue.Constraint

  • public class Constraint
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used when querying JobQueues to fetch particular jobs.

    JobQueues should not reference this class after the query method returns because Constraints are re-used by the JobManager.

        public boolean shouldNotRequireNetwork()
        Returns true if the network is currently not available.
        Returns:
        True if network connection is currently unavailable, false otherwise.

      • shouldNotRequireUnmeteredNetwork

        public boolean shouldNotRequireUnmeteredNetwork()
        Returns true if the unmetered network is currently not available.
        Returns:
        True if the unmetered network connection is currently unavailable, false otherwise.

      • getTagConstraint

        public TagConstraint getTagConstraint()
        The tag constraint to be used while querying with tags.
        Returns:
        The tag constraint to be used or null if there is no tag constraints.
        See Also:
        getTags()

      • getTags

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getTags()
        The set of tags. If this list is not-empty, getTagConstraint() will have a non-null result.
        Returns:
        The set of tags
        See Also:
        getTagConstraint()

      • getExcludeGroups

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getExcludeGroups()
        The list of groups to be excluded. It is guaranteed to be ordered in natural string sorting order.
        Returns:
        The set of job groups to exclude.

      • excludeRunning

        public boolean excludeRunning()
        Returns true if running jobs should be excluded from the query
        Returns:
        True if running jobs should be excluded

      • getTimeLimit

        public java.lang.Long getTimeLimit()
        Exclude jobs whose run time is after this time. Might be null if there is no time limit.
        Returns:
        Time in NS which should be used to filter out delayed jobs
